Index.meta_description: Transform your body and mind with JuanjoFIT's personalized training programs, nutrition plans, and expert coaching.

Hero.title: Transform your body and mind with <important>JuanjoFIT</important> personal training.
Hero.description: With over 10 years of experience helping clients achieve their fitness goals, I provide personalized training programs, expert nutrition guidance, and dedicated coaching tailored to your unique needs.

Features.section_description: I offer a range of professional services designed to help you achieve your fitness goals, no matter your starting point or experience level.
Features.feature_description: Each service is tailored to your individual needs, ensuring you get the most effective and efficient fitness journey possible.

Pricing.section_title: Find the Perfect Plan for Your Goals
Pricing.section_description: Choose from my range of specialized training programs designed to meet your specific fitness goals and lifestyle needs.

FAQ.question: What can I expect from my first training session?
FAQ.answer: Your first session includes a comprehensive fitness assessment where we'll discuss your goals, medical history, and current fitness level. We'll also perform some basic movement assessments to identify any imbalances or areas that need special attention. This helps me create a personalized plan that's safe, effective, and tailored to your specific needs.

CTA.title: Ready to transform your fitness?
CTA.description: Take the first step towards a healthier, stronger you with my personalized training programs. Whether you're just starting your fitness journey or looking to reach new heights, I'm here to guide you every step of the way.

ProtectFallback.not_enough_permission: You do not have the permissions to perform this action

SignUp.meta_description: Create your account to begin your fitness journey with JuanjoFIT.

Dashboard.meta_description: Access your personalized training programs, nutrition plans, and progress tracking.

DashboardIndex.message_state_description: Track your progress, access your workout plans, and manage your nutrition all in one place.

TodoForm.title_description: Enter a name for your workout (e.g., 'Upper Body Strength').
TodoForm.message_description: Enter details such as sets, reps, weights, and how you felt during the workout.
